ygData.subject: Re: EQ Money
ygData.msgSnippet: I was close approaching level 14 when I made a trip over to Antonica. with a heavily map-obsessed wizard in tote, we went all the way over to Qeynos. by
ygData.messageBody:
I was close approaching level 14 when I made a trip over to Antonica. with a
heavily map-obsessed wizard in tote, we went all the way over to Qeynos. by
myself, hunting gnolls in Blackburrow for an hour or three, I made 10 pp.
after a few trips there and to the Bandit camps nearby, I got the 55 pp to
buy my combine long sword (and hunting in the catacombs got me up to level
15 when I was with my wizard friend). the trip is a pain and I highly
recommend camo if you are going the Beholder route. also, if you go through
HighHold, do *not* investigate the inn. an evil dark elf necro killed me
*twice* in there and finally my wizard friend had to be consented (he was
bound there, while I was at Rivervale). I found that Faydwer was lacking in
exp and money at my level, but now that I have a magical weapon, I may try
Dagnor's Cauldron when I get back home. I hope this helps.

Eglath, level 15 High Elf Paladin

"By G'Quon, I cannot remember the last time I was in a fight like that! No
moral ambiguity. No ancient and overpowering Enemy. They were, as you say,
the Bad Guys, and we were the Good Guys....and they made a very satisfying
*thump* when they hit the ground!"
--G'Kar, A Late Delivery from Avalon

On Mon, 7 Jun 1999, McConnell, Jeff wrote:

> From: "McConnell, Jeff" <Jeff.McConnell@...>
>
>
> Hello All
> I am a 15th lvl High elf Paladin on Cazic-Thule, and I am located in
> the Faydwer area. My primary hunting grounds right now are the Aqua-Goblins
> (big group only) and Unrest. The problem I am facing is even though I have
> all the spells for 15th lvl and I have a majority of metal armor (some is
> still leather) I can't seem to make any real money. I have noticed a great
> need for a combine weapon but at my present rate it will take literally
> forever. I tend to hunt in groups of 3 or 4 and generally for around 5 hours
> a day. I guess what I would like to know is, Am I doing something wrong? or
> is everyone broke at this lvl? Is there a better spot to hunt? Your
> assistance is most appreciated.
>
> Silvermyst
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Give back to your community through "Grow to Give."
> http://www.onelist.com
> Deadline is June 19. See homepage for details.
>
